entry.title: Friday: Flurries or rain showers. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon.
entry.summary: A few rain showers or flurries changing to a few flurries near noon. Risk of freezing drizzle early this afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023
